data.name: Tetragon Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850/Tetragon/


About the Game

Fabulous musical compositions will enchant and immerse you in the world of Tetragon. You will feel calm and serenity while listening to these tunes. Wrap yourself up in the enchanting mystic right now with this set of musical compositions from the maestro Júlio Miotto!
data.about_the_game: Fabulous musical compositions will enchant and immerse you in the world of Tetragon. You will feel calm and serenity while listening to these tunes. Wrap yourself up in the enchanting mystic right now with this set of musical compositions from the maestro Júlio Miotto!
data.short_description: This is additional content for Tetragon, but does not include the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 305 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 305 MB available space
